Package ohos.bluetooth.ble

Class BlePeripheralDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bluetooth.ble.BlePeripheralDevice

  • public class BlePeripheralDevice
extends Object
    Provides the types of Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) peripheral devices and related operations.

    Related operations include connecting to, disconnecting from, and disabling a BLE peripheral device.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int CONNECTION_PRIORITY_HIGH
      Connection parameter update - Request a high priority, low latency connection.
      static int CONNECTION_PRIORITY_LOW
      Connection parameter update - Request low power, reduced data rate connection parameters.
      static int CONNECTION_PRIORITY_NORMAL
      Connection parameter update - Use the connection parameters recommended by the Bluetooth SIG.
      static int OPERATION_SUCC
      Indicates that the operation succeeds.

    • Field Detail

      • CONNECTION_PRIORITY_HIGH

        public static final int CONNECTION_PRIORITY_HIGH
        Connection parameter update - Request a high priority, low latency connection. An application should only request high priority connection parameters to transfer large amounts of data over LE quickly. Once the transfer is complete, the application should request CONNECTION_PRIORITY_NORMAL connection parameters to reduce energy use.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONNECTION_PRIORITY_LOW

        public static final int CONNECTION_PRIORITY_LOW
        Connection parameter update - Request low power, reduced data rate connection parameters.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONNECTION_PRIORITY_NORMAL

        public static final int CONNECTION_PRIORITY_NORMAL
        Connection parameter update - Use the connection parameters recommended by the Bluetooth SIG. This is the default value if no connection parameter update is requested.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPERATION_SUCC

        public static final int OPERATION_SUCC
        Indicates that the operation succeeds.

        This constant applies to all operations supported by BLE peripheral devices.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static BlePeripheralDevice createInstance​(String address)
        Creates a BlePeripheralDevice object with a specified MAC address.
        Parameters:
        address - Indicates the MAC address.
        Returns:
        Returns the BlePeripheralDevice object, which can be used to connect to or disconnect from a BLE peripheral device.
        Since:
        5

      • getDeviceAddr

        public String getDeviceAddr​()
        Obtains the MAC address of this BlePeripheralDevice object.
        Returns:
        Returns the MAC address.
        Since:
        5

      • connect

        public boolean connect​(boolean isAutoConnect,
                       BlePeripheralCallback callback)
        Connects to a BLE peripheral device.

        The BlePeripheralCallback#connectionStateChangeEvent(int) method is called to return the connection result.

        Parameters:
        isAutoConnect - Specifies whether to automatically connect to the device.
        callback - Indicates the BlePeripheralCallback.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the connection is established; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • discoverServices

        public boolean discoverServices​()
        Starts discovering services.

        This method is asynchronous. The BlePeripheralCallback#servicesDiscoveredEvent(int) method is called to return the service discovery result.

        Returns:
        Returns true if services are discovered; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getServices

        public List<GattService> getServices​()
        Obtains the list of services of a BLE peripheral device.

        Before calling this method, you must call the discoverServices() method to start service discovery and ensure that the BlePeripheralCallback#servicesDiscoveredEvent(int) method is called.

        Returns:
        Returns the list of services of the BLE peripheral device.
        Since:
        1

      • getService

        public Optional<GattService> getService​(UUID uuid)
        Obtains a specified service of the current BLE peripheral device.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Indicates the UUID of the service.
        Returns:
        Returns Optional if the device supports the service with the specified UUID; returns Optional#empty() otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • disconnect

        public boolean disconnect​()
        Disconnects from or stops an ongoing connection to a BLE peripheral device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the disconnection process starts; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • close

        public boolean close​()
        Disables a BLE peripheral device.

        This method deregisters the device and clears the registered callbacks and handles.

        Returns:
        Returns true if the device is disabled; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • readCharacteristic

        public boolean readCharacteristic​(GattCharacteristic characteristic)
        Reads the characteristic of a BLE peripheral device.

        This method is asynchronous. The BlePeripheralCallback#characteristicReadEvent(GattCharacteristic, int) method is called to return the read result.

        Parameters:
        characteristic - Indicates the characteristic to read.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the characteristic is read successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • writeCharacteristic

        public boolean writeCharacteristic​(GattCharacteristic characteristic)
        Writes the characteristic of a BLE peripheral device.

        This method is asynchronous. The BlePeripheralCallback#characteristicWriteEvent(GattCharacteristic, int) method is called to return the write result.

        Parameters:
        characteristic - Indicates the characteristic to write.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the characteristic is written successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • setNotifyCharacteristic

        public boolean setNotifyCharacteristic​(GattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                       boolean enable)
        Enables or disables notification of a characteristic.
        Parameters:
        enable - Specifies whether to enable notification of the characteristic. The value true indicates that notification is enabled, and the value false indicates that notification is disabled.
        Returns:
        Returns true if notification of the characteristic is enabled or disabled; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • readDescriptor

        public boolean readDescriptor​(GattDescriptor descriptor)
        Reads the descriptor of a BLE peripheral device.

        The BlePeripheralCallback#descriptorReadEvent(GattDescriptor, int) method is called to return the read result.

        Parameters:
        descriptor - Indicates the descriptor to read.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the descriptor is read successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • writeDescriptor

        public boolean writeDescriptor​(GattDescriptor descriptor)
        Writes the descriptor of a BLE peripheral device.

        The BlePeripheralCallback#descriptorWriteEvent(GattDescriptor, int) method is called to return the write result.

        Parameters:
        descriptor - Indicates the descriptor to write.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the descriptor is written successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • readRemoteRssiValue

        public boolean readRemoteRssiValue​()
        Reads the RSSI value of this BLE peripheral device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the RSSI value is read; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • requestBleConnectionPriority

        public boolean requestBleConnectionPriority​(int connPriority)
        Requests the connection priority of this BLE peripheral device.

        Three connection priorities are available: CONNECTION_PRIORITY_NORMAL, CONNECTION_PRIORITY_HIGH, and CONNECTION_PRIORITY_LOW.

        Parameters:
        connPriority - Indicates the connection priority to request.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the request is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • requestBleMtuSize

        public boolean requestBleMtuSize​(int mtu)
        Request the mtu size of a BLE peripheral device.
        Parameters:
        mtu - the max size.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the request mtu is successfully; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getDeviceName

        public Optional<String> getDeviceName​()
        Obtains the name of this BlePeripheralDevice object.
        Returns:
        Returns a string representation of the name if obtained; returns Optional#empty() if the name fails to be obtained.
        Since:
        5
